description:
The demonic Host continues the search for his master, and Megumin may be the only one who can keep him from destroying Axel in the process.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: An Explosion on This Wonderful World!
Eine Explosion auf dieser wunderschönen Welt
Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Explosion o!
Une explosion sur ce monde merveilleux !
この素晴らしい世界に爆焔[エクスプロージョン]を!
